GSD.product_version: versions from v4.17 to before v5.10.121
GSD.description:
mtd: rawnand: denali: Use managed device resources

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.10.121 by commit 3c68daf4a368cd9e63ae5a2145c9e4a6f838c166, it was introduced in version v4.17 by commit 93db446a424cee9387b532995e6b516667079555. For more details please see the references link.
